description: This attractive, rustic - style restaurant is situated just a few kilometres from the centre of Cervinia. It stands in a tranquil, panoramic basin where the only neighbours are the marmots in the hills around. Popular with passing tourists, as well as locals who feel the journey out here is well worth the effort. The restaurant offers a good range of choices for all palates. This includes soups, different cuts of meat, typical specialities from the Aosta valley and even a few fish dishes. This address is also worth a mention for the attractive guestrooms available.
facilitiesServices: Car park, Garden or park, Terrace
